column4: I can't istall ubuntu 5.x in my computer I have a ASUS A8V-E Deluxe
well then you are missing a few critical things, such as a cdrom drive
i would go and get a processor, case, maybe a few fans, powersupply, etc
hard to fix a problem with what you are telling us
give us your COMPLETE system specifications
i want to know the material of the case
with what you are telling us we couldnt figure out if its the videocard or the fact that the computer isnt plugged in
thats a step in the right direction
now the CPU temp while running?
you seem to know a lot for someone who doesnt give any info..
look, you have hardware you arent talking about, you have steps leading up to that black screen
its like me saying "I HAVE A COMPUTER" and expecting everyone to know how to take it apart and put it back together again without knowing what components are there and what they are
what happens before the blank screen, and right after?
any noises? tell tale signs of an issue?
is it black or some other color?
